actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide loans for the construction and initial operation of municipal, low-rent, nonprofit clinics for the spaying and neutering of dogs and cats.

summary.text: Animal Clinic Loan Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make loans, not exceeding $50,000, to certain municipalities for the construction and operation of nonprofit clinics for the spaying and neutering of dogs and cats. Sets forth requirements with respect to the control of dogs and cats which must be met by a municipality as a condition for receiving such a loan. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide loans for the construction and initial operation of municipal, low-rent, nonprofit clinics for the spaying and neutering of dogs and cats.
